programme.title: Druk
Drunk
programme.desc: Druk: Directed by Thomas Vinterberg. With Mads Mikkelsen, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang, Lars Ranthe. Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10288566/","name":"Druk","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTNjM2Y2ZjgtMDc5NS00MDQ1LTgyNGYtYzYwMTAyNWQwYTMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjE4NzUxNDA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10288566/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gustav_gerdes"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"A stunning performance from the actors and director, that leave you absolutely speechless!","reviewBody":"I went to the cinema today to watch my third movie from Thomas Vinterberg, after watching "The Celebration"(1998) and "The Hunt"(2012) i had huge expectations for this movie. And i have to say that i got surprised even more than i thought was possible.\n\n"Another Round" or the danish title and phrase "Druk" is just a cinematic experience on another level. I as a Dane can relate to this movie, as if it were written directly to the individual citizen. The way the story is bound together with great dialogue and humor is indeed phenomenal, the way the story criticize the danish alcohol-culture is even more breathtaking, and thought-provoking. With of course amazing performances from Lars Ranthe, Thomas Bo Larsen, Magnus Millang and Mads Mikkelsen. You can really feel that the actors and crew have been working hard on this task, and all turned out great. Once again Vinterberg have done it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":103730,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-24","keywords":"heavy drinking,drinking,teacher,high school,friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4070162713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ4NGY3ZWEtMWYyMy00MzY4LWFlNzktYjdmMGFjYTIxNGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDQ4NGY3ZWEtMWYyMy00MzY4LWFlNzktYjdmMGFjYTIxNGJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXN3aWZ0dw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four friends, all high school teachers, test a theory that they will improve their lives by maintaining a constant level of alcohol in their blood."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0586568/","name":"Mads Mikkelsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488917/","name":"Thomas Bo Larsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2099237/","name":"Magnus Millang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0899121/","name":"Thomas Vinterberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136662/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0338571/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0899121/","name":"Thomas Vinterberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2105585/","name":"Tobias Lindholm"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Avida
Avida
programme.desc:
Avida: Directed by Benoît Delépine, Gustave Kervern. With Anselme, Fernando Arrabal, Anne Benett, Beu. The kidnapping of a plump billionaire's dog by a deaf-mute and 2 ketamine addicts goes wrong. The wealthy woman takes advantage of the situation to make them fullfil her last wishes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0478558/","name":"Avida","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjhhMGYwNGMtOWUxYS00NDZlLWFhNmItZjcwZTUxZjE3OTE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzk5OTU5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The kidnapping of a plump billionaire's dog by a deaf-mute and 2 ketamine addicts goes wrong. The wealthy woman takes advantage of the situation to make them fullfil her last wishes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0478558/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JFriday"},"dateCreated":"2009-08-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"It'll keep you guessing - why you wasted your time.","reviewBody":"Nothing at all like what the synopsis at the film festival led me to expect. This is the only movie that I have ever walked out on in my life. And I did that with only 15 minutes left in the show.

A clever ad agency might write a tagline such as "It'll keep you guessing!" What they really mean is that you will never know what the hell it's about. There was a vague pretext that seemed to offer a hint of progression and kept you thinking that it would all make sense in the end. When I realized that there was no way they could cobble together a storyline in the final 15 minutes, I decided that their time was up.

Essentially, it was a macabre sequence of situations that mostly gave the viewer a repulsive look at the actions and reactions of unsupervised people with mild to strong mental handicaps. It relied on using midgets, obese people and various unpleasant stereotypes to present a very non politically correct image. While I don't oppose challenging the PC crowd, it ought to at least be done with a message. In this case, the message appears to be "french people are messed up"."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":634,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-13","keywords":"surrealism,overweight woman,experimental film,dwarf,character name as title","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285397/","name":"Anselme"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0037130/","name":"Fernando Arrabal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285208/","name":"Anne Benett"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0218022/","name":"Benoît Delépine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1086956/","name":"Gustave Kervern"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086918/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0218022/","name":"Benoît Delépine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1086956/","name":"Gustave Kervern"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

This is the only movie that I have ever walked out on in my life. And I did that with only 15 minutes left in the show.

A clever ad agency might write a tagline such as "It'll keep you guessing!" What they really mean is that you will never know what the hell it's about. programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Six Minutes to Midnight: Directed by Andy Goddard. With Nigel Lindsay, Judi Dench, Eddie Izzard, Jim Broadbent. UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5114840/","name":"Six Minutes to Midnight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY1YWI4NzEtNmYyMS00NWFjLTk3YTgtNTkzNWFkZDlmNmZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5114840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"merridew-2"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Do We Really Care?","reviewBody":"Reportedly, Eddie Izzard, whose family is from Bexhill, knew the story of the real Augusta Victoria school and wanted to turn it into a WWII drama. But what is there really to this story: (a) there is a British school for the daughters of high-ranking German Nazis (inexplicably being educated in England) whom (b) the Germans want brought back to Germany before the war begins but (c) the British want detained in England (but would commit a diplomatic faux pas if they detained them prematurely). But does anyone truly care if these girls stay or go? All of the intrigue and thriller elements (some of which are reasonably well executed) are laid on top of what, at its core, is a seemingly inconsequential premise. Whether it's true or not, it's uninteresting. The twists and effective moments should have been saved for a film where the stakes were something we cared about.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-15","keywords":"world war two","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4131766553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1939, school teacher Thomas Miller (Eddie Izzard) takes a last minute role teaching English at the Augusta-Victoria College, Bexhill-on-Sea, a finishing school on the south coast of England. Despite the political storm clouds forming across Europe, daughters of influential families in Nazi Germany learn deportment, Shakespeare and how to be faithful members of Hitler’s League of German Girls."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0512283/","name":"Nigel Lindsay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0468830/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0857703/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427714/","name":"Celyn Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Profession : danseur.euse
programme.desc: Marion Motin, Germain Louvet, Léo Walk, Lasseindra Ninja, Ludmila Pagliero et Mehdi Kerkouche prennent le temps de raconter leur métier, qui est également une passion. Quels sont leurs modèles ? Que cherchent-ils à atteindre ? Comment vivent-ils leurs émotions sur scène ? Quel rapport entretiennent-ils avec leur corps ? Tous vont échanger sur leur passion et partager leurs points de vue. Danseur étoile, chorégraphe de danse contemporaine ou s'illustrant dans le hip hop ou le voguing, ils s'illustrent dans des styles différents mais partagent un même amour pour leur art.
programme.category: Magazine de société

Mignonnes
programme.desc: Mignonnes: Directed by Maïmouna Doucouré. With Fathia Youssouf, Médina El Aidi-Azouni, Esther Gohourou, Ilanah Cami-Goursolas. programme.title: Kem's
programme.desc: Sous ses ordres, deux équipes de deux personnalités s'affrontent pour devenir les maîtres du Kem's. Le but : échanger des cartes afin de réunir quatre cartes identiques et le faire savoir à son coéquipier par un signe particulier. Évidemment, il ne faut pas se faire griller sous peine de se faire contre-kemser ! Entre cartes loufoques, signes étonnants et mauvais perdants de légende, vous irez tous vous faire Kem's avec Ramzy ! "Avec la participation de Redouane Bougheraba, Amel Chabi, Franck Dubosc, Thomas Dutronc, Gad Elmaleh, Laura Felpin, Maxime Gasteuil, JoeyStarr, Matthieu Longatte, Michou, Félix Moati, Natoo, Jérôme Niel, Elie Semoun, Claudia Tagbo, Jean-Pascal Zadi...

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Six Minutes to Midnight: Directed by Andy Goddard. With Nigel Lindsay, Judi Dench, Eddie Izzard, Jim Broadbent. UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5114840/","name":"Six Minutes to Midnight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGY1YWI4NzEtNmYyMS00NWFjLTk3YTgtNTkzNWFkZDlmNmZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"UK, Aug. 15, 1939: 17 days before WWII, an English teacher and his camera disappear on a coastal boarding school with 20 German teen girls. Miller gets the job 6 days later, secretly trying to find out what happened.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5114840/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"merridew-2"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Do We Really Care?","reviewBody":"Reportedly, Eddie Izzard, whose family is from Bexhill, knew the story of the real Augusta Victoria school and wanted to turn it into a WWII drama. But what is there really to this story: (a) there is a British school for the daughters of high-ranking German Nazis (inexplicably being educated in England) whom (b) the Germans want brought back to Germany before the war begins but (c) the British want detained in England (but would commit a diplomatic faux pas if they detained them prematurely). But does anyone truly care if these girls stay or go? All of the intrigue and thriller elements (some of which are reasonably well executed) are laid on top of what, at its core, is a seemingly inconsequential premise. Whether it's true or not, it's uninteresting. The twists and effective moments should have been saved for a film where the stakes were something we cared about.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-15","keywords":"world war two","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4131766553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMzNWE4NDUtYzA1OC00ZjM1LWIyZjYtNGJjODNlOTcwYjY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"In the summer of 1939, school teacher Thomas Miller (Eddie Izzard) takes a last minute role teaching English at the Augusta-Victoria College, Bexhill-on-Sea, a finishing school on the south coast of England. Despite the political storm clouds forming across Europe, daughters of influential families in Nazi Germany learn deportment, Shakespeare and how to be faithful members of Hitler’s League of German Girls."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0512283/","name":"Nigel Lindsay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0484683/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0468830/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0857703/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412850/","name":"Eddie Izzard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0427714/","name":"Celyn Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0323758/","name":"Andy Goddard"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shadowplay
Shadowplay
programme.desc:
Shadowplay: With Taylor Kitsch, Michael C. Hall, Logan Marshall-Green, Nina Hoss. Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8879894/","name":"Shadowplay","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M1YzFiYzAtNGUwYS00MmE1LTg2ZTEtM2FkYjg1NTgxMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzg5MzIyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Max McLaughlin is an American cop who arrives in Berlin in the summer of 1946 to help create a police force in the chaotic aftermath of the war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8879894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"yooniverse"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A decent show despite shortcomings","reviewBody":"First of all, "Shadowplay" is a dumb name for this show. "The Defeated", the show's original title, might have been better. But neither really captures the show that well. Set in post-war Germany shortly after their defeat, the show's early episodes seem to do a decent job of capturing the misery, desperation, and the broken remains of a country and its people who not only lost the war, but had their civilization bombed into submission.

And perhaps that's why a story of a NYPD cop trying to help rebuild and reestablish law and order sounded like a good premise. But that epic-worthy premise gets weighed down by a search for a brother who's gone AWOL, run-ins with Russian military (which is okay if they weren't made into villains), and multitudes of minor story branches that just seem to drag the story into smaller issues that muddle the show and makes the story feel small. What gets lost is the bigger picture, of what is transpiring at the historical level during this time period. This is no Babylon Berlin, which in my opinion, is a masterpiece.

And what's up with the Brooklyn accent? Kitsch does a passable job, but the show can't seem to make up its mind on whether he's a scrappy street cop or a polished NY police brass savvy in the ways of bureaucracy and politics. I suppose it's part of his backstory, but to me, it feels unnecessary, just like all the f-bombs casually thrown in.

Despite all its shortcomings, the show is beautifully shot, the acting is mostly good (mostly the Germans), and there is a main story that makes its way through, I think. It's not entirely a waste of time to watch--if you have the time, that is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2295,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-10-30","keywords":"police protagonist,american cop abroad,american in germany,post war germany,world war two","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2018237/","name":"Taylor Kitsch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334869/","name":"Logan Marshall-Green"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0352167/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0309252/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078814/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi500744473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FjMTMyOWQtM2EyOS00YjZjLTk5MDctM2ZmZjExOGFkYjI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shadowplay: Die Komplette 1 Staffel (German)"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Après la disparition mystérieuse de l'oiseau atteint par la radioactivité, Didier Mathure se retrouve sans éléments tangibles pour pousuivre son enquête. Pour autant, en arrivant en retard à un rendez-vous, le scientifique constate que sa montre et celles des membres de son équipe retardent étrangement de douze minutes. Par ailleurs, André, l'ancien chef du Gepan, adresse à Didier et Marcel un élément menant à un témoin important.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Marcel et Didier ont rendez-vous dans une chambre d'hôtel avec André. Une fois sur place, ils sont accueillis par Héléna Korska, l'assistante du physicien Andreï Sakharov. La jeune femme russe prétend que l'ancien chef du Gepan lui a donné rendez-vous dans cet hôtel pour lui remettre des preuves irréfutables sur l'existence des extraterrestres. De son côté, Véra quitte le Gepan pour devenir membre du mouvement du Nouvel ordre cosmique.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Le Nouvel ordre cosmique, le mouvement spirituel lancé par Zorel, l'homme qui prétend avoir été enlévé par des extraterrestres, fait de nombreux adeptes. Au Cnes, la commission chargée d'enquêter sur l'explosion de la fusée à Kourou doit rendre ses conclusions. Bernard, l'un des responsables, est prêt à tout pour faire porter le chapeau à Didier. Ses chances d'intégrer l'Angence spatiale européenne sont désormais minces.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Paris Police 1900
Paris Police 1900
programme.desc: Paris Police 1900: Created by Fabien Nury. With Jérémie Laheurte, Evelyne Brochu, Thibaut Evrard, Marc Barbé. Paris, France, 1899. The corpse of an unknown woman is found in the river Seine. The investigation will push a young ambitious inspector to discover a heavy state secret." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10840070/","name":"Paris Police 1900","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY4NmNlYzQtOWI2NS00OTA1LTgzZjAtOTQzMzVmMDI4ZWVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Crime","Drama","History"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5398167/","name":"Jérémie Laheurte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2903342/","name":"Evelyne Brochu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5198870/","name":"Thibaut Evrard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0341057/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1942997/","name":"Fabien Nury"}],"datePublished":"2021-02-08","description":"Paris, France, 1899. The corpse of an unknown woman is found in the river Seine. The investigation will push a young ambitious inspector to discover a heavy state secret.","keywords":"investigation,french police,paris france,france,belle epoque","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10840070/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting but one big default....","reviewBody":"I admit that this series is very daring and inventive, especially for those craving for history matters, for people interested in facts never told before. This TV show is pulled by an awesome production design, supported by so many accurate details and problems which existed one hundred years ago. But this doesn't prevent the whole job to be messy, with no control of the story, a scheme where you have the feeling that are too much ingredients: crime, politics, drama, thriller, romance, comedy. The creator himself admitted to have insisted on the purpose to please ANYONE, to reach the largest audiences. I won't compare this strategy with CASA DEL PAPEL crap, though I perfectly could after all, but as I have already said, I hate this kind of point of view, reaching the largest audiences, because the result is not always the quality of the show. So, if you want to learn about French politics of the early 1900's, that OK, that's definitely for you. To summarize, that remains French on the shape, BUT not on the background, NOT on the message: to teach modern audiences what the politics of those years were.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":367,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7}}</script><metacontent="

The investigation will push a young ambitious inspector to discover a heavy state secret.","keywords":"investigation,french police,paris france,france,belle epoque","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10840070/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"searchanddestroy-1","dateCreated":"2021-02-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting but one big default....","reviewBody":"I admit that this series is very daring and inventive, especially for those craving for history matters, for people interested in facts never told before. This TV show is pulled by an awesome production design, supported by so many accurate details and problems which existed one hundred years ago. But this doesn't prevent the whole job to be messy, with no control of the story, a scheme where you have the feeling that are too much ingredients: crime, politics, drama, thriller, romance, comedy. The creator himself admitted to have insisted on the purpose to please ANYONE, to reach the largest audiences. I won't compare this strategy with CASA DEL PAPEL crap, though I perfectly could after all, but as I have already said, I hate this kind of point of view, reaching the largest audiences, because the result is not always the quality of the show. So, if you want to learn about French politics of the early 1900's, that OK, that's definitely for you. To summarize, that remains French on the shape, BUT not on the background, NOT on the message: to teach modern audiences what the politics of those years were.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":367,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Le ballon d'or
Le ballon d'or
programme.desc: Le ballon d'or: Directed by Cheik Doukouré. With Aboubacar Sidiki Sumah, Agnès Soral, Habib Hammoud, Mody Sory Barry. The story of Salif Keïta, first "Ballon d'or d'Afrique" (African Golden Ball)." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0109201/","name":"Le ballon d'or","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMDc3MjAzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzM4MTkxMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Salif Keïta, first "Ballon d'or d'Afrique" (African Golden Ball).","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0109201/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Fitzie22"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Twelve-year old African boy hopes to become new Roger Milla and starts his soccer odyssey, facing all kinds of problems on the way","reviewBody":"This is actually one of my favorite movies. It gives good insight in the daily problems that young Africans like Bandian face and the culture they grow up in. I myself think it's horrible to see that his parents, with the help of some medicine man, decide what Bandian should do and shouldn't do with his life. But it's also a film of joy and hope. Bandian meets new friends on the way and learns about trust and forgiveness. The film paints great pictures of the African landscape. By the way, if you're a soccer fan, you'll probably like the action scenes of Bandian performing magic on the ball. I'd give it a 8 out of 10 rating."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":272,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Comedy","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"1994-04-13","keywords":"soccer","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0838514/","name":"Aboubacar Sidiki Sumah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0814718/","name":"Agnès Soral"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358829/","name":"Habib Hammoud"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235370/","name":"Cheik Doukouré"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0076241/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112542/","name":"Martin Brossollet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136024/","name":"David Carayan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0235370/","name":"Cheik Doukouré"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marc, 36 ans, est un pilote de ligne épanoui dans sa vie professionnelle. Pour autant, il n'a pas encore trouver l'âme sœur. Il décide donc de participer à une émission de de télé-réalité dans l'espoir de rencontrer celle avec qui il pourra fonder une famille. Durant plusieurs semaines, treize femmes célibataires issues de toute la France vont tenter de le séduire.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: L'élimination de la première candidate a profondément bouleversé Marc. Le jeune célibataire constate qu'il a peur de s'impliquer dans une relation sérieuse avec une femme. Il décide d'en parler avec son psychologue, le docteur Juiphe. Il décide ensuite de faire passer un test d'humour aux douze candidates. Il invitera à dîner celle qui saura le divertir.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marc accorde beaucoup d'importance à son physique et multiplie les séances de sport dans sa vie en compagnie de Tony, son coach personnel. Ce dernier sombre peu à peu dans la dépression depuis que sa femme a demandé le divorce. De leur côté, les onze candidates encore en lice participent à des olympiades aquatiques. La lauréate passera un après-midi en compagnie de Marc.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marc apprend que les candidates préparent un grand buffet de tartines beurrées à l'occasion de la fête de la "Jean-Guile". Le célibataire semble être le seul à ne pas connaître cette fête traditionnelle célébrée chaque année. De leur côté, les jeunes femmes décident de se déguiser pour l'occasion. Contre toute attente, Sarah ressent les premiers signes de l'accouchement. La production de l'émission l'emmène en urgence à l'hôpital.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Après avoir accouché, Sarah a décidé de quitter le jeu. La naissance de cet enfant a profondément bouleversé Marc qui éprouve des envies de paternité. Il se confie à son psychologue, le docteur Juiphe. Pour évaluer le degré de générosité des candidates encore en lice, Marc convie les jeunes femmes a construire des abris pour une association qui s'occupe des sans domiciles fixe. Manon qui a connu pareille expérience retrouve un de ses amis.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: La production annonce à Marc que Chataléré va fêter son anniversaire. Le jeune pilote décide d'organiser une sortie en tête-à-tête avec elle au grand dam d'Alexandra et des autres candidates. Marc emmène son invitée à l'écurie des Roseaux afin de faire du cheval. Contre toute attente, Chataléré tombe sous le charme du palfregnier, un homme robuste et sympathique.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marina ne dissimule plus ses sentiments pour Soraya. Elle tente de lui ouvrir son coeur lors d'une séance de massage. Marc est de plus inquiet. Le jeune célibataire remarque que les candidates encore en lice ne se battent plus pour attirer son attention. En compagnie de Tony Tonic, son coach sportif, Marc organise une épreuve du parcours du combattant pour remotiver les filles.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Les candidates encore en course dans l'émission vont tenter de se qualifier pour les demi-finales du jeu. Le temps est venu pour Marc de rencontrer les familles des prétendantes. Il sympathise avec le père de Valérie qui lui promet de lui prêter son avion s'il choisit sa fille. De son côté, la mère de Marina ne se montre pas insensible aux charmes du célibataire.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Géraldine Nakache
Ana Girardot

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: La Flamme
programme.desc: Marc a passé la nuit avec Anne afin de rendre Marina jalouse. Pour autant, cette dernière n'est pas tout attiré par le jeune homme et continue de lui cacher son attirance pour les femmes. Marc invite Marina a une dégustation de vins régionaux.

credits.actor: Jonathan Cohen
Leïla Bekhti
Camille Chamoux

programme.category: Série humoristique

Soupçons
programme.sub-title: Crime ou accident ?
programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0388644, Title: Soupçons, --- Description: Soupçons: With Michael Peterson, David Rudolf, Ron Guerette, Martha Ratliff. The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0388644/","name":"Soupçons","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU4NTE3MDY4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk4NjY1NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0388644/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lallen08","dateCreated":"2010-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Biased and fascinating on many levels","reviewBody":"I knew nothing about the Peterson case before watching this film obsessively over a weekend. Even with Lestrade's clearly biased presentation, I came to the same conclusion the jury did - testament to the strength of the autopsy evidence. Res ipsa loquitur - she simply could not have died from a fall down the stairs given the lacerations and the blood. And nothing to suggest that an intruder caused her death. Sure, I winced when Freda Black went on and on about the porn, as if its existence on Peterson's computer in and of itself indicates anything. But all in all it was an interesting lesson into how the skilled storyteller can skew anything towards his chosen bias. And the score was absolutely exquisite.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20484,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary","Crime","Drama"],"keywords":"columnist,blowpoke,true crime,blood,staircase","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2023399/","name":"Michael Peterson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5308683/","name":"David Rudolf","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5509614/","name":"Ron Guerette"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070801/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Staircase - Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2745482009","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWJlZTMyYTktYjA0Mi00ODRiLThkMzQtMmNkM2JmNjI0OTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWJlZTMyYTktYjA0Mi00ODRiLThkMzQtMmNkM2JmNjI0OTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"The compelling story of Michael Peterson, a crime novelist accused of killing wife Kathleen after she is found dead at the bottom of a staircase in their home."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0388644, Title: Soupçons, --- Description: Soupçons: With Michael Peterson, David Rudolf, Ron Guerette, Martha Ratliff. The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0388644/","name":"Soupçons","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU4NTE3MDY4NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODk4NjY1NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The high-profile murder trial of American novelist Michael Peterson following the death of his wife in 2001.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0388644/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"lallen08","dateCreated":"2010-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Biased and fascinating on many levels","reviewBody":"I knew nothing about the Peterson case before watching this film obsessively over a weekend. Even with Lestrade's clearly biased presentation, I came to the same conclusion the jury did - testament to the strength of the autopsy evidence. Res ipsa loquitur - she simply could not have died from a fall down the stairs given the lacerations and the blood. And nothing to suggest that an intruder caused her death. Sure, I winced when Freda Black went on and on about the porn, as if its existence on Peterson's computer in and of itself indicates anything. But all in all it was an interesting lesson into how the skilled storyteller can skew anything towards his chosen bias. programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Le commandant Valérie Delbosse enquête seule sur un phénomène spatial troublant. Elle a rédigé un protocole de défense contre la menace ovni. De peur de ne pas être prise au sérieux, elle demande à Didier Mathure de le présenter aux plus aux sphères de l'état français. De leur côté, Véra et Rémy tente d'élucider le mystère du lac rempli de chaussures. Bernard annonce à Didier qu'Elise est la candidate du Cnes pour intégrer le pôle européen Ariane Espace.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire
Daphné Patakia
Jean-Charles Clichet
Laurent Poitrenaux

programme.title: Ovni(s)
programme.desc: Après l'explosion du satellite du Cnes chargé d'examiner les marées, le professeur Mathure décide de faire une déclaration à la télévision. De son côté, Elise oriente sa candidature sur un nouveau projet. Au Cnes, la direction est en émoi et cherche à comprendre les raisons qui ont provoqué la chute du satellite dans l'atmosphère. Rémy met tout en ouevre pour effacer son intervention sur l'ordinateur principal.

credits.actor: Melvil Poupaud
Michel Vuillermoz
Géraldine Pailhas
Quentin Dolmaire

programme.category: Série humoristique

programme.title: Possessions
Possessions
programme.desc: Possessions: Created by Shahar Magen. With Nadia Tereszkiewicz, Reda Kateb, Dominique Valadié, Ariane Ascaride. In Israel. The very evening of her wedding, Natalie, a young Frenchwoman, is accused of having killed her husband. The French state dispatched Karim, a diplomat, to the scene to help her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10569810/","name":"Possessions","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmMyYTg2OTAtZjJiMy00MGYzLWFlNGUtZWZmNmUzYTkzNmVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"In Israel. The very evening of her wedding, Natalie, a young Frenchwoman, is accused of having killed her husband. The French state dispatched Karim, a diplomat, to the scene to help her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10569810/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lisbethinsydney"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Exceptionally different","reviewBody":"Showing in Australia with subtitles on SBS On Demand, this is a fascinating detective series offering an insight into life in Israel as well as a truly intriguing murder mystery. The detectives also look like real police officers for once and involving the French consular representative offers an outsider's extra viewpoint. Those who keep the rational explanation in mind will be rewarded. Well acted, including participation by Tcheky Karyo, one of the best French actors, and filmed with a real sense of place and atmosphere. Definitely recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":277,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2020-11-02","keywords":"female amnesiac,wife accused of murdering her husband,israel,temporary amnesia,murder investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8066528/","name":"Nadia Tereszkiewicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3024530/","name":"Reda Kateb"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0883462/","name":"Dominique Valadié"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030799/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4209487/","name":"Shahar Magen"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1887224089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJiZGIyNzctOGEzZC00OTdmLWIzNjgtMzMwNTZiODFkMDQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTJiZGIyNzctOGEzZC00OTdmLWIzNjgtMzMwNTZiODFkMDQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The series tells the story of Natalie, a young French expatriate in Israel, is charged with the murder of her husband on their wedding night. Karim, a French diplomat in charge of helping French citizens who have to deal with the Israeli authorities, slowly falls for Natalie. He cannot figure out whether the young lady is deeply lost and vulnerable, or dangerously manipulative. Obsessed with this case, Karim will dive into Natalie and her family’s mysterious past."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: American Horror Story
American Horror Story
American Horror Story : Double Feature
programme.sub-title: S10 E3 S10 E3 Thirst
programme.desc:
American Horror Story: Created by Brad Falchuk, Ryan Murphy. With Evan Peters, Sarah Paulson, Denis O'Hare, Kathy Bates. An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, and a slasher summer camp." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1844624/","name":"American Horror Story","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWFhOGI5ZmQtNjA1My00NWExLTg1MDktYThkYWI3ZTc4ZDYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a house with a murderous past, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show circus, a haunted hotel, a possessed farmhouse, a cult, the apocalypse, and a","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1844624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Red_Identity"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"An excellent, entertaining, and very intriguing Horror show!","reviewBody":"Unlike many reviewers on here, I have waited until the end of the first season to actually review this series as a whole. I want to start off with the Pilot. When I first saw it, I had a lot of problems with it. It was messy, and some of the characters were dumb, and some of the acting was corny. However, after the Pilot ended, I realized just how intrigued I was by it. It sure was a messy Pilot, but that's the beauty of it. It was always moving, it wasn't your typical slow-paced suspense show. 

In fact, that pretty much sums up the whole season. This is a crackling, fast-paced and entertaining horror series. I would never call this high- art, but that's what makes it great. The show doesn't take itself seriously at all, and it always remains fun, even when it's silly, and yet you get really invested in the story lines and characters. Sure, the performances are flawed at times, and the writing and directing awkward, but the fast pace in every episode doesn't ever let the viewer gasp for air. This is the true definition of a thrill ride. It also feels very experimental. It executes a lot of things in very unordinary ways, in ways that no other TV show does. It doesn't always succeed, but even when it doesn't, you can appreciate it. 

Your friends might call The Walking Dead the better horror show, but I disagree. As far as Pilots go, no matter how entertaining or thrilling American Horror Story's Pilot was, the Pilot for The Walking Dead was better, masterful in every way. Since then, it's merely a good, sometimes great, TV show. It takes itself more seriously and is slower-paced, but it's problem is that a lot of times the writing just feels stale, recycled. You are intrigued by it, but it sometimes feels weaker than it should be. And the fact that it takes itself too seriously sort of dampens the fun one should be having with it, simply because its writing isn't strong enough to stretch out its story lines (like the two best TV shows on air, Mad Men and Breaking Bad, do). American Horror Story is better for these reasons- each episode by itself is exciting, it's always moving, and instead of trying to slow things down and makes its flaws more apparent, it even overdoes things on purpose. Messy, sure, silly, sometimes, but overall more intriguing, funner, and more exciting. I cannot wait for the second season of this, since I thought the resolution to the story of the first season was excellent, as well as the final shot. 

P.S. Oh, I also want to add another note to take. The performances do hit their great marks, but the only truly incredible performance is Jessica Lange. Her character and performance makes all other supporting turns in television look stale by comparison, and all of her scenes are truly gold! She needs to win that Emmy next year! I want to see her back!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":288753,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-10-05","keywords":"anthology,male objectification,infidelity,supernatural,serial murder","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3078932/","name":"Lady Gaga"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000870/","name":"Kathy Bates"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000291/","name":"Angela Bassett"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060381/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314634/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156994/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1004299/","name":"Brad Falchuk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Part 1: Red Tide - Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3243294745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmNjJmM2EtMTA4NC00YTg2LWJkY2UtZmRkZDc4YTdmMTA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmNjJmM2EtMTA4NC00YTg2LWJkY2UtZmRkZDc4YTdmMTA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Your first taste. Watch the OFFICIAL TRAILER for American Horror Story: DoubleFeature, Part 1 now. Premieres 8.25 FX, next day FX on Hulu."}}</script><metacontent="

I want to start off with the Pilot. When I first saw it, I had a lot of problems with it. It was messy, and some of the characters were dumb, and some of the acting was corny. However, after the Pilot ended, I realized just how intrigued I was by it. It sure was a messy Pilot, but that's the beauty of it. It was always moving, it wasn't your typical slow-paced suspense show. 

In fact, that pretty much sums up the whole season. This is a crackling, fast-paced and entertaining horror series. I would never call this high- art, but that's what makes it great. The show doesn't take itself seriously at all, and it always remains fun, even when it's silly, and yet you get really invested in the story lines and characters. Sure, the performances are flawed at times, and the writing and directing awkward, but the fast pace in every episode doesn't ever let the viewer gasp for air. This is the true definition of a thrill ride. It also feels very experimental. It executes a lot of things in very unordinary ways, in ways that no other TV show does. It doesn't always succeed, but even when it doesn't, you can appreciate it. 

Your friends might call The Walking Dead the better horror show, but I disagree. As far as Pilots go, no matter how entertaining or thrilling American Horror Story's Pilot was, the Pilot for The Walking Dead was better, masterful in every way. Since then, it's merely a good, sometimes great, TV show. It takes itself more seriously and is slower-paced, but it's problem is that a lot of times the writing just feels stale, recycled. You are intrigued by it, but it sometimes feels weaker than it should be. And the fact that it takes itself too seriously sort of dampens the fun one should be having with it, simply because its writing isn't strong enough to stretch out its story lines (like the two best TV shows on air, Mad Men and Breaking Bad, do). American Horror Story is better for these reasons- each episode by itself is exciting, it's always moving, and instead of trying to slow things down and makes its flaws more apparent, it even overdoes things on purpose. Messy, sure, silly, sometimes, but overall more intriguing, funner, and more exciting. I cannot wait for the second season of this, since I thought the resolution to the story of the first season was excellent, as well as the final shot. 

P.S. Oh, I also want to add another note to take. The performances do hit their great marks, but the only truly incredible performance is Jessica Lange. Her character and performance makes all other supporting turns in television look stale by comparison, and all of her scenes are truly gold! She needs to win that Emmy next year! I want to see her back!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":288753,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-10-05","keywords":"anthology,male objectification,infidelity,supernatural,serial murder","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3078932/","name":"Lady Gaga","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000870/","name":"Kathy Bates","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000291/","name":"Angela Bassett"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060381/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314634/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156994/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1004299/","name":"Brad Falchuk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614682/","name":"Ryan Murphy"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Part 1: Red Tide - Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3243294745","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmNjJmM2EtMTA4NC00YTg2LWJkY2UtZmRkZDc4YTdmMTA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODBmNjJmM2EtMTA4NC00YTg2LWJkY2UtZmRkZDc4YTdmMTA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Your first taste. programme.title: Scandal Sheet
L'inexorable enquête
programme.desc: Scandal Sheet: Directed by Phil Karlson. With Broderick Crawford, Donna Reed, John Derek, Rosemary DeCamp. The editor of an exploitation newspaper commits a murder and assigns his protégé to investigate hoping to divert attention away from himself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0045124/","name":"Scandal Sheet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0MTkzMDYxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjUxNjIzMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The editor of an exploitation newspaper commits a murder and assigns his protégé to investigate hoping to divert attention away from himself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0045124/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"whpratt1"},"dateCreated":"2007-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Strange & Mysterious Film","reviewBody":"Enjoy the great acting of Broderick Crawford, (Mark Chapman) who is the editor of a popular newspaper and his star reporter is John Derek, (Steve McCleary) and a very attractive Julie Allison, (Donna Reed) who gives a great supporting role. Mark Chapman is a go getter for this popular newspaper and always manages to capture crimes of murder with the great assistance of Steve McCleary. However, Steve McCleary investigates a recent murder of a woman who has died rather mysteriously and delves deeply into its background and is able to determine the killer and the complete reason for the murdering of this woman. There are many twists and turns in this film and Broderick Crawford and Donna Reed give outstanding performances which make this a very interesting and enjoyable film to view from 1952.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2295,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"Passed","genre":["Crime","Drama","Film-Noir"],"datePublished":"1952-01-16","keywords":"taming of the shrew,dysfunctional marriage,manipulative female,manipulative wife,mother daughter relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scandal Sheet","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2764028697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk3NDQ3MWYtMzZiNy00Yjg5LTljZTQtOWJlNDhlMDRiZjNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk3NDQ3MWYtMzZiNy00Yjg5LTljZTQtOWJlNDhlMDRiZjNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001135/","name":"John Derek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001656/","name":"Donna Reed"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002024/","name":"Broderick Crawford"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0439597/","name":"Phil Karlson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0134950/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792090/","name":"Ted Sherdeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0512702/","name":"Eugene Ling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688117/","name":"James Poe"}],"duration":"PT1H22M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
Il était un petit navire
programme.desc:
Barnacle Bill: Directed by Charles Frend. With Alec Guinness, Harry Locke, Frederick Piper, Fred Griffiths. A seasick sea Captain commands an amusement pier despite local opposition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0050168/","name":"Barnacle Bill","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU0NDE1ZDMtMmQ0Yi00ODkyLWJlNGMtYTNjMmVhNzYyNGQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI4MjA5MzA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A seasick sea Captain commands an amusement pier despite local opposition.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0050168/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"aahamme"},"dateCreated":"2017-07-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable silliness","reviewBody":"Sir Alec was his usual fine self, and the story is enjoyably trite and silly, but the constant, odd fade-outs instead of proper scene endings makes one think that this was a victim of Ealing Studio's death. Few of the scenes are allowed to resolve themselves,while a few shots needed to be cut much shorter (the Ancestral Ghosts and their overlong, unfunny dance, for instance - 20 seconds would've been enough) leaving one to assume that many minutes of the story were trashed by Ealing's "mortician".

The story would have been well served if we could have seen a few positive effects upon the Town, when the Pier became a Ship. Just a few shots of people crowding into sad restaurants and seaside rooming houses, while they awaited a 'berth' on the Arabella, would have built much expectation and suspense. I bet that such scenes WERE filmed but later chopped, as there are several references to the Arabella bringing much business to the Town, but we never see that. 

I cannot recall another movie like this, where drama, dialogue, and music cues are cut-off by disturbing "fades-outs" of sound and picture. But if the MGM idiots (who also dumped its entire warehouse/library into pits along a highway) had anything to do with this, one should not be surprised.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1013,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"Unrated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1957-12-21","keywords":"pier,seasickness,arcade,cruise ship,english channel","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000027/","name":"Alec Guinness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516742/","name":"Harry Locke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684891/","name":"Frederick Piper"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0294243/","name":"Charles Frend"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040024/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0165021/","name":"T.E.B. Clarke"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

Few of the scenes are allowed to resolve themselves,while a few shots needed to be cut much shorter (the Ancestral Ghosts and their overlong, unfunny dance, for instance - 20 seconds would've been enough) leaving one to assume that many minutes of the story were trashed by Ealing's "mortician".

The story would have been well served if we could have seen a few positive effects upon the Town, when the Pier became a Ship. I cannot recall another movie like this, where drama, dialogue, and music cues are cut-off by disturbing "fades-outs" of sound and picture. programme.category: Culture

programme.title: Mamá cumple 100 años
Maman a cent ans
programme.desc:
Mamá cumple 100 años: Directed by Carlos Saura. With Geraldine Chaplin, Amparo Muñoz, Fernando Fernán Gómez, Norman Briski. Ana is alive and married with Antonio; they arrive in the manor in the countryside of Spain where she worked as a nanny many years ago, for the centennial birthday of the matriarch. In their reunion, she finds that Jose died three years ago; Juan left his wife Luchy; Fernando is still living with his mother and unsuccessfully trying to fly a hang glider; and the three little girls are grown-up. Further, she discovers that the dysfunctional family is completely broken, and Luchy in embezzling mother's money. When Juan arrives for the celebration, he plots with Fernando and Luchy to kill the mother to get the inheritance. Meanwhile, Antonio has a brief affair with Natalia." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0079517/","name":"Mamá cumple 100 años","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJmNTdlNTktNDk5Yy00ZGU2LTllMzgtNmYxZWI0Nzg5ZjdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ana is alive and married with Antonio; they arrive in the manor in the countryside of Spain where she worked as a nanny many years ago, for the centennial birthday of the matriarch. In their reunion, she finds that Jose died three ye","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079517/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Miksa76"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grandma is 100 years old","reviewBody":"This is one hilarious film. I remember watching it over and over again on our VCR when I was about 12 years old. I recall being fascinated with this fantastic family, which was nothing like our bleak, Scandinavian existence! I saw it about 10 times...

It's about the grandma's centennial birthday, which gathers together all the family, with their marital and family problems. Some have schemes and plots to embezzle the family's money. The themes also deal with generation-gap and cultural environment in Franco's Spain. However, the Grandma is larger-than-life figure, almost akin to the creations of magical realism. She's able to have, for example, a telepathic connection with her granddaughter. Her son Federico is a "mad scientist" and a dreamer.

The whole film is set in the country house and it's surroundings. All the characters are colourful and rich, funny and tragical. The actress playing the Grand old lady does a terrific job!! Besides, the film is well shot, and the music echoes richly in memories of the persons.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1178,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1979-11-07","keywords":"full frontal female nudity,attempted flight,memory,hang glider,glider","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001036/","name":"Geraldine Chaplin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0616361/","name":"Amparo Muñoz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0273178/","name":"Fernando Fernán Gómez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0767022/","name":"Carlos Saura"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020931/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065243/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060888/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0767022/","name":"Carlos Saura"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

In their reunion, she finds that Jose died three ye","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0079517/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Miksa76","dateCreated":"2004-09-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Grandma is 100 years old","reviewBody":"This is one hilarious film. I remember watching it over and over again on our VCR when I was about 12 years old. I recall being fascinated with this fantastic family, which was nothing like our bleak, Scandinavian existence! I saw it about 10 times...

It's about the grandma's centennial birthday, which gathers together all the family, with their marital and family problems. Some have schemes and plots to embezzle the family's money. The themes also deal with generation-gap and cultural environment in Franco's Spain. However, the Grandma is larger-than-life figure, almost akin to the creations of magical realism. She's able to have, for example, a telepathic connection with her granddaughter. Her son Federico is a "mad scientist" and a dreamer.

The whole film is set in the country house and it's surroundings. All the characters are colourful and rich, funny and tragical. The actress playing the Grand old lady does a terrific job!! Besides, the film is well shot, and the music echoes richly in memories of the persons.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1178,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1979-11-07","keywords":"full frontal female nudity,attempted flight,memory,hang glider,glider","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001036/","name":"Geraldine Chaplin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0616361/","name":"Amparo Muñoz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0273178/","name":"Fernando Fernán Gómez"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0767022/","name":"Carlos Saura"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020931/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065243/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060888/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0767022/","name":"Carlos Saura"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride
La chevauchée des sept mercenaires
programme.desc: The Magnificent Seven Ride!: Directed by George McCowan. With Lee Van Cleef, Stefanie Powers, Michael Callan, Mariette Hartley. Forced by personal circumstances, Marshal Chris Adams recruits a writer and five prisoners to help him eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0068897/","name":"The Magnificent Seven Ride!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1Nzg5NDAwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTM1ODE1NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Forced by personal circumstances, Marshal Chris Adams recruits a writer and five prisoners to help him eliminate a gang of Mexican bandits.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0068897/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-08-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Acceptable and passable sequel with a revenger Lee Van Cleef , post-Sergio Leone","reviewBody":"This is the last sequel to ¨Magnificent seven¨ with the skinny Lee Van Cleef as tough gunslinger named Chris (whose character was played by Yul Brynner in two occasions and one performed by Lee Van Cleef and George Kennedy). He's nowadays as sheriff , Marshal Chris Adams , who turns down a friend's request to help stop the depredations of a band of Mexican bandits , but then his spouse (Mariette Hartley) has been kidnapped by a gang . When his wife is abducted by bank thieves and his friend is murdered capturing the last outlaw , Chris feels obligated to take up his partner's cause . Then Chris along with a journalist (Michael Callan) set off in pursuit bandit gunfighters (Gary Busey among them) , as he recruits five prisoners to track down the desperadoes . Besides , Chris helping his buddy (Ralph Waite) must free a Mexican village (inhabited by women as Stefanie Powers , among others) besieged by nasty outlaws who are devastating the small location . Lee van Cleef is decided to take a group of prisoners and strike a blow against the Mexican bandits . He goes to Tucson Territorial Prison where a bunch of misfits , murderers , robbers , rapists and other prisoners (with a TV star-studded cast such as Pedro Armendariz , Luke Askew, William Lucking, Ed Lauter, and James B. Sikking ) get a chance to redeem themselves . As Chris recruits various Magnificent Men and once again defending hapless people from their oppressors . As a brand of new seven , doing their number , they put their lives on the line and let it ride . \n\nThe last in the original series of four ¨The Magnificent Seven¨ movies , here Lee Van Cleef as Chris , substituting Yul Brynner , who played the role in two occasions , and one performed by George Kennedy . Yul Brynner insisted he would only make the sequels if Steve McQueen was not involved , McQueen felt the plot was too absurd and for this, and other reasons, was not interested anyway . Van Cleef as a two-fisted avenger sheriff is good as well as his role of ¨Sabata¨, meanwhile Yul Brynner left the Chris character for playing the ¨Cleef's Sabata¨ role in ¨Indio Black¨ . The story is similar to previous entries , adding ¨Dirty dozen¨ wake , including customary outlaw band formed by an eclectic gang with diverse speciality , as dynamite or guns . The film gets action Western , exciting riding, shootouts, it's funny and entertaining , although nothing new but displays a television style . The movie contains some moment of grisly violence and even touching on the relationships between the women and the Magnificent . This is a drab , inferior sequel from the original and enduringly popular ¨The magnificent seven¨ (John Sturges,1960) that is equally remake to ¨The seven samurais¨ (in fact , it was Yul Brynner who approached producer Walter Mirisch with the idea of doing a Western adaptation of Akira Kurosawa's classic) . After that , followed ¨The return of the seven¨(Burt Kennedy,1966), again with Brynner and ¨Guns of the magnificent seven¨ (Paul Wendkos,1969) with George Kennedy and continued with a TV series and a Television movie realized in 1998 . As always , breathtaking and memorable musical score by the great Elmer Berstein. Elmer , whose score for the series is one of the best-known ever composed , also wrote the soundtrack for the parody of this film, 'Three amigos'. Appropriate cinematography by expert cameraman Fred J. Koenekamp (Patton, The inferno towering, Papillon) . The motion picture was regularly directed by George McCowan , a usual TV episodes director (Charlie's Angels , Banacek , Cannon , Starsky and Hutch) . The film will appeal to Lee Van Cleef fans .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2747,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Western"],"datePublished":"1972-08-01","keywords":"arizona territory,tucson territorial prison,tucson arizona,magdalena mexico,sonora mexico","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1448198425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjIwNTZmMTUtNzQ2Yy00OGFkLWFkOTItY2I3ODA0ZTAxOWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjIwNTZmMTUtNzQ2Yy00OGFkLWFkOTItY2I3ODA0ZTAxOWI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001812/","name":"Lee Van Cleef"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0694619/","name":"Stefanie Powers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0130286/","name":"Michael Callan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566671/","name":"George McCowan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054562/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0746473/","name":"Arthur Rowe"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Heroes of Telemark
The Heroes of Telemark
programme.desc: The Heroes of Telemark: Directed by Anthony Mann. With Kirk Douglas, Richard Harris, Ulla Jacobsson, Michael Redgrave. Norwegian resistance tries to stop German efforts to produce an atomic bomb component during World War II." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059263/","name":"The Heroes of Telemark","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWUyMjVhOTQtMmZjOC00N2IxLWEwYzEtYTA2ZGZhODU3NjhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Norwegian resistance tries to stop German efforts to produce an atomic bomb component during World War II.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059263/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"de_niro_2001"},"dateCreated":"2001-01-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best Second World War Thriller Movie","reviewBody":"While one might question the ethics of making entertainment out of the Second World War when it was a terrible experience for all concerned this film does well. There is plenty of suspense in the film and it also shows the inconceivable wickedness of the Nazis. This film tells very effectively the story of a number of people who thwarted Hitler's attempts to produce a war winning weapon. For dramatic purposes Kirk Douglas and Richard Harris play amalgams of several different people but the film sticks to the basic facts. The film also shows the stupidity of war and brings home the value of human life. May humanity never again have to go through such a terrible experience as the Second World War and films like this should be shown to bring home that we live in an infinitely better world nowadays."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6866,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"1965-12-03","keywords":"nazi occupation,norwegian resistance,sabotage,heavy water,reference to j. robert oppenheimer","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000018/","name":"Kirk Douglas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001321/","name":"Richard Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0414965/","name":"Ulla Jacobsson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542649/","name":"Anthony Mann"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0204588/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595573/","name":"Ivan Moffat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0059553/","name":"Ben Barzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0056217/","name":"Harold Pinter"}],"duration":"PT2H11M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: La nuit du carrefour
La nuit du carrefour
programme.desc:
La nuit du carrefour: Directed by Jean Renoir. With Pierre Renoir, Georges Térof, Winna Winifried, Georges Koudria. A gang of thieves utilizes a cross-road garage as the hideaway. During their last caper, the gang has accidentally murdered a jewel thief, and the heat is on." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0023284/","name":"La nuit du carrefour","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTZjZWI4NGMtZmMwNS00OTdmLWIwZTctYjY4ZTViNmI3MWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyNzA5ODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A gang of thieves utilizes a cross-road garage as the hideaway. During their last caper, the gang has accidentally murdered a jewel thief, and the heat is on.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0023284/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"boblipton"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Occam's Razor Shows This Is a Bad Mystery","reviewBody":"At a small, outlying suburb of Paris that seems to be three houses, a butcher shop and a garage or two, a corpse is found in a car. It's a Jewish diamond merchant from the Low Countries. The police are soon sweating the owner of the garage, George Koudria. He is an exiled Swedish aristocrat who lives in one of the houses with his sister, Winna Winnifred. Enter Inspector Maigret in the person of Pierre Renoir, the brother of the movie's director, Jean Renoir. Koudria does not crack, and he is sent back to his home. He flees across the border, while Maigret wanders around, asking question that have nothing to do with the events, watching and listening.

Renoir (the director) made this film between LA CHIENNE and BOUDU SAVED FROM DROWNING. Those films would seem more typical of his movies, with this one an odd outlier, a potboiler to offer some income and prove he is a bankable film maker. I found it fairly typical of his works in which relationships are unclear and it is up to Renoir (the actor) to winkle them out for the audience. You may look on it as a try-out for THE RULES OF THE GAME with murder, and Simenon's name to add to the commercial value of the effort. It's a fine, atmospheric movie, if you ignore the simple matter of the mystery.

The problem I have with the mystery is that there is a perfectly good and simple explanation of who did it up to the point where Maigret begins to demonstrate his theory. Simenon and the Renoir brothers play fairly with the audience in this murder mystery, but the actual solution is far more complicated than the one offered early on. That the solution turns out to be the truth is a trick of the writer. Another solution could just as easily been written and Maigret could have produced the evidence equally easily, should Simenon and the director have wished it. In effect, they produce the clues after the audience has been given the complete story.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":777,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1932-04-18","keywords":"wheel,car,foreigner,garage,investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719749/","name":"Pierre Renoir"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879412/","name":"Georges Térof"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935108/","name":"Winna Winifried"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719756/","name":"Jean Renoir"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002289/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799442/","name":"Georges Simenon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719756/","name":"Jean Renoir"}],"duration":"PT1H15M"}</script><metacontent="
